answers.answer: The thing about that test is that you and your baby are ok, that you don't have your sugar levels way too high for it to be dangerous. Anyway, having said that, I think you'll be fine if you delay the test a week, I think it's just and orientative date.
Am even am 26 weeks n 5 days. .. bt my doctor dint ask me for any investigations........ ????
Most doctors do the test between 26-28 weeks.
I got one late too because of a public holiday. It doesn't matter too much. As long as you get it done sometime
Thanks guys its made me feel a bit better knowing its not so so serious to get it done this week.

question: Hi guys (:I am 26 weeks today and have recently moved a few hours away from my original hospital, the hospital i am transferring to is great but i am due for my 26week blood tests for diabetes a few other things and also the anti-d injection which because of the move and christmas im not to sure if i am going to be able to booking in for my bloods at exaclty 26weeks... my question is does it matter if i get them done at 27weeks or do i need them done this week?
title: Blood tests at 26weeks
